meanings.definition: The act or process of creating maps.
meanings.sent1: Her mapmakings were meticulous, ensuring every detail was accurate.
meanings.sent2: The mapmakings of the explorer were essential for navigating through the unknown terrain.
meanings.sent3: During the treasure hunt, his mapmakings led us to unexpected places.
meanings.sent4: Her mapmakings were like a magical journey unfolding before our eyes.
meanings.sent5: The mapmakings of the cartographer brought the world to life on paper.

meanings.definition: The skill or practice of making maps.
meanings.sent1: His mapmakings showed expertise in cartography and geography.
meanings.sent2: Learning the art of mapmakings requires patience and attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The pirate's mapmakings were so good, even the parrot could follow them.
meanings.sent4: Her mapmakings were a blend of artistry and precision, creating masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The mapmakings of the ancient civilizations still fascinate historians today.
